column4: hi! I am trying to make my sound card work. I think I have  found exactly what I need on the forum.  But I cant understand it. What does "went to 'init 1'" mean?
Okay, figured it out, went to 'init 1' and ran the commends from there, my SOUndblaster Live! 24 finally works!!!"
It means that the Linux system got to init 1
